about-me.title: Who I am
about-me.about-me-text1: hi, im a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Kiel. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating, immersive and intuitive websites and aplications.
about-me.location-text: Flexible in therms of working enviorements, I can work effectivley both on-site in Kiel as well as remotely.
about-me.mindset-text: I am open.minded and alwys looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about-me.profession-text: In my profession, programming isn't just about writibg code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user friendly solutions. This way , I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skillSet.title: Technologies
skillSet.text1: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of  using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with the rapid changes in web development.
skillSet.text2: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.text: Explore a selection of my work here - interact with projects to see my skills in action.

portfolio-Overlay.textJoin: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio-Overlay.textElPolloLoco: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
portfolio-Overlay.textDABubble: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

testimonials.text1: Dominik integrated seamlessly into the group work, independently developed numerous solutions, and played a key role in transforming the initial folder structure chaos into a clear and understandable system. Working with him was highly enjoyable, and I am confident that he excels in a team environment.
testimonials.text2: Dominik is an excellent colleague who works with remarkable efficiency and speed. His attention to detail and his composed demeanor make him an invaluable member of the team. In addition to his technical expertise, his pleasant personality contributes to a harmonious working environment.
testimonials.text3: Working with Dominik has been a truly pleasant experience! Not only is he extremely dedicated and eager to learn, but he also brings an open and communicative approach that enriches every collaboration. His friendly nature and motivation to constantly grow make him a valuable team player with whom working is genuinely enjoyable.
testimonials.text4: Dominik is an exceptionally reliable team player. He does not shy away from challenges and is always ready to take on responsibility. His ability to find clear solutions even under time pressure is truly impressive.
testimonials.text5: Dominik is a resilient and dedicated team member who remained focused even during challenging times. Despite personal difficulties, he worked diligently toward project success. Compared to our last group project, he significantly improved his speed and efficiency. He welcomed feedback as an opportunity to grow and maintained a positive attitude, even when facing setbacks.
testimonials.text6: Working with Dominik has always been a valuable experience, as he is not only professionally skilled but also brings a highly solution-oriented mindset. He engages with various approaches, challenges existing structures, and contributes to the team in finding the best solutions together.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.text: Contact me through this form, i am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.policy-text3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined
contact.error-msg: Failed to send message. Please try again later.

privacy-policy.title: Legal Notice & Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.text: This website collects personal information only through the contact form. The information you provide (name, email) is used solely for responding to your inquiries.
